main.title: COVID-19 Cough Detection
main.note: Please note: This form is for data collection only. It will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.
main.privacyPolicy: By proceeding you accept the terms of our Privacy Policy
main.virufyInfo:
Virufy partners with 50 organizations including Amazon Web Services, Stanford University’s COVID-19 Response Innovation Lab, and One Young World, and is powered by 250 volunteers and staff as a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. We developed a smartphone app that leverages AI to analyze recorded cough audio and evaluate the risk of diseases such as tuberculosis, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, COVID-19, and influenza. Virufy is supported by professors and alumni from Stanford, MIT, and Harvard.

By collecting cough recordings from people around the world, Virufy continually improves its AI algorithm to recognize the unique acoustic patterns of each disease.

Please note: This form is for data collection only. It will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.

helpVirufy.aboutParagraph: <0>Virufy is a robust 501(c)(3) nonprofit company with 250 volunteers/staff and 50 partner organizations including Amazon Web Services, Stanford COVID-19 Response Innovation Lab, and One Young World. We've developed a smartphone app which leverages AI to analyze the signature of recorded coughs to determine their similarity with COVID positive cough data. Virufy is supported by faculty and alumni from UW, Stanford, UC Berkeley, MIT, Harvard, and CMU. <1>By collecting coughs recordings from people around the world, Virufy is improving the robustness of its AI algorithm in recognizing COVID’s unique sound pattern.<2>You have the power to help benefit millions of people across the globe by contributing your cough in our study.

beforeStart.title: Lastly, before we start...
beforeStart.subtitle: To ensure safety, we advise you to:
advise_list: Please use your own device and wear a mask when appropriate.
Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough/speech.
If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk from coughing, please check with your health care provider before participating.
If you feel your symptoms are getting worse, please contact your local medical response.

recordCough.title: Instructions
recordCough.intro1: Find a quiet environment at least 20 ft (6m) away from others and wear a cloth or surgical mask. If you are feeling ill, please sit down.
recordCough.intro2: Hold your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth and do not obstruct or cover your device with plastic. Do not cough violently or too forcefully.
recordCough.text: Tap the record button and cough intentionally into the bottom of your phone 3 times with a deep breath between each cough. When you are done, tap the stop button.

recordingsIntroduction.shortRecording: Please make a recording of at least 2 seconds

recordingsRecordManual.micError: Can’t access the mic? Upload an audio file.
recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Please upload an audio file here.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Please upload a file of at least 3 seconds
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Please upload a file of less than 5 MB

predictionResult.resultModal: Important note: This app will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.
predictionResult.resultNotDetectedText: Your voice does not seem to have indicators of COVID-19. Please continue to take appropriate measures based on the advice of your healthcare professional or applicable regulatory body and reassess yourself in our app daily.
predictionResult.resultModalDummy: Important note: This app will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsiblity to seek medical advice from your doctor.
predictionResult.resultNotAnalyzeText: Our algorithm could not determine indicators of COVID-19 from your cough. Please record and submit another cough.
predictionResult.resultDetectedText: Your voice has indicators of possible COVID-19. Please contact your healthcare professional and take additional precautions.
predictionResult.submitError: An error occurred. Please try again.
